name: hoya
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a climbing Asian and Australian evergreen (= that never loses its leaves) tropical plant with white and pink flowers, grown in gardens or in a container inside a house: The hoya now spread its vines down to the floor and across the walls. Hoyas come in different shapes and sizes and have the daintiest of blooms with a lovely smell.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bedroom was overgrown with the vines of the flowering hoya.From the ceiling, on a hook, hung a waxy leafed hoya.She had various hoya plants clambering about the roof.
